Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Frosted glass picture windows fill the eastern wall, allowing light to filter into the room by day while still allowing for privacy in this Moroccan tiled private bathhouse. The cerulean and white tiles are hand-painted with lush floral and geometric patterns that cover the walls and floor, the center of the space sunken in tiered steps to a depth of four feet, the pool filled with hot water that fills the air with steam. Cedar and teak benches tucked into the corners of the room add a subtle perfume to the air. Overhead, a large chandelier with ornate foliage carved into the arms infuses the space with a golden flickering light that illuminates the steam in an aura of glow.

The cerulean and white tiles are hand-painted with lush floral and geometric patterns that cover the walls and floor, the center of the space sunken in tiered steps to a depth of four feet, the pool filled with hot water that fills the air with steam. Cedar and teak benches tucked into the corners of the room add a subtle perfume to the air. Overhead, a large chandelier with ornate foliage carved into the arms infuses the space with a golden flickering light that illuminates the steam in an aura of glow.

Frosted glass picture windows fill the eastern wall, allowing light to filter into the room by day while still allowing for privacy in this Moroccan tiled private bathhouse. The cerulean and white tiles are hand-painted with lush floral and geometric patterns that cover the walls and floor, the center of the space sunken in tiered steps to a depth of four feet, the pool filled with hot water that fills the air with steam. Cedar and teak benches tucked into the corners of the room add a subtle perfume to the air. Overhead, a large chandelier with ornate foliage carved into the arms infuses the space with a golden flickering light that illuminates the steam in an aura of glow.
an arched double door leading north

Each side of the arched double door leading to the north is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
an arched double door leading south

Each side of the arched double door leading to the south is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
an arched double door leading west

Each side of the arched double door leading to the west is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
